C

com.topcoder.util.format - package com.topcoder.util.format
 

D

DateFormatMethod - interface com.topcoder.util.format.DateFormatMethod.
An interface that provides a method for formatting Dates as strings.

F

FormatMethodFactory - class com.topcoder.util.format.FormatMethodFactory.
A factory class for creating standard format methods.
format(Date) - Method in interface com.topcoder.util.format.DateFormatMethod
Converts the given Date into an appropriate string representation.

Converts the given Object into an appropriate string representation.

Converts the given Object into an appropriate string representation.

Converts the given byte into an appropriate string representation.

Converts the given char into an appropriate string representation.

Converts the given int into an appropriate string representation.

G

getDefaultDateFormatMethod(String) - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.FormatMethodFactory
Gets a Date format method that will format dates according to the supplied format string.
getDefaultDateFormatMethod(String, SimpleDateFormat) - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.FormatMethodFactory
Gets a Date format method that will format dates according to the supplied format string and the supplied SimpleDateFormat.
getDefaultObjectFormatMethod() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.FormatMethodFactory
Gets a default method for formatting Objects.
getEmptyFormatter() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatterFactory
Returns an empty formatter, which will not be able to format any object without being supplied with the appropriate ObjectFormatMethod.
getFormatMethodForClass(Class) - Method in interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatter
Gets the format method associated with a particular type.
getFormatMethodForObject(Object) - Method in interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatter
Gets the format method that would be used to format the given object.
getFormatter(String) - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts each primitive type into a string representation according to the supplied format string.
getFormatter(String, DecimalFormat) - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts each primitive type into a string representation according to the supplied format string and DecimalFormat.
getPlainFormatter() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts an object into a formatted string by calling the object's toString method.
getPlainFormatter() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts each primitive type into its plain string representation.
getPrettyFormatter() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts an object into a prettified formatted string.
getPrettyFormatter() - Static method in class com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatterFactory
Returns a formatter that converts each primitive type into a "pretty" string representation.

O

ObjectFormatMethod - interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatMethod.
An interface that provides a method for formatting Objects as strings.
ObjectFormatter - interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatter.
A formatter for non-primitive types (ie Objects).
ObjectFormatterFactory - class com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatterFactory.
A factory class for creating ObjectFormatters.

P

PrimitiveFormatter - interface com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatter.
A formatter for primitive types.
PrimitiveFormatterFactory - class com.topcoder.util.format.PrimitiveFormatterFactory.
A factory class for creating PrimitiveFormatters.

S

setFormatMethodForClass(Class, ObjectFormatMethod, boolean) - Method in interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatter
Sets the format method associated with a particular type (and possibly subtypes).

U

unsetFormatMethodForClass(Class) - Method in interface com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatter
Removes the associated format method for a particular type.
